instructions: Place the dinner plate on the lower side of the table cloth, and slightly to the left
Place the dinner fork directly to the left of the dinner plate with its tines pointed upward
Place the salad fork, tines upward, to the left of the dinner fork, aligned to the centers of both forks
Place the dinner knife directly to the right of the dinner plate, with its blade facing the dinner plate
Place the salad knife directly to the right of and slightly above the dinner knife, its blade toward the dinner plate
Place the soup spoon, bowl upward, directly to the right of the salad knife
Place the water glass above and slightly to the right of the dinner plate
Place the wine glass directly to the right of the water glass
Place the second wine glass above and slightly to the right of the soup spoon
Place the coffee cup directly to the right of the soup spoon
Place the bread plate directly above the dinner fork
Place the butter knife, blade facing left, diagonally across the upper right side of the bread plate
Place the dessert fork horizontally above the dinner plate, with the tines toward the right
Place the dessert spoon horizontally above the dessert fork, with the bowl to the left
Place the napkin vertically across the center of the plate
